stable.message: No stable release yet. Please use beta or dev.

beta.name: rasqberry-beta-2025-12-30
highlights: Quantum Paradoxes - 14 interactive notebooks with Qiskit 2.x compatibility
Fun-with-Quantum - Quantum Coin Game, GHZ Game, Grover's Algorithm
Virtual LED Display - Demo mode without physical hardware
Touch Mode - Kiosk-friendly interface with on-screen keyboard
IBM Quantum Tutorials - Desktop shortcuts and credentials notebook
ARM64 Native Builds - Faster CI with native ARM runners + wheel cache

dev.name: rasqberry-dev-ab01-2025-12-31-130722
highlights: use /usr/bin instead of /usr/local/bin for script paths
add terminal-aware progress indicators to rq_update_slot.sh
add --reboot flag to switch-to command and show partition sizes
